name: CMGT_Case_Title_Input
description: Input interface for "title" field in CMGT_Case
sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: #"urn:appian:record-field-properties:v1:d81cdd0e-c54d-4b8e-beec-b7ae37fefe7f/cc5741b7-43ad-438b-844e-8da8538c9cae/displayName",
  labelPosition: "ABOVE",
  value: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.title],
  saveInto: a!save(
    ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.title],
    striphtml(
      save!value
    )
  ),
  refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS",
  characterLimit: if(
    ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.source] = cons!CMGT_TXT_SOURCE_APPIAN,
    cons!CMGT_INT_MAX_CHAR_LIMIT_MEDIUM,
    100
  ),
  showCharacterCount: false(),
  required: true,
  requiredMessage: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:4fab94dc-fcb1-427a-af9f-1239079b2897"(
    #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:3e31b6d5-df20-4d17-80a7-81f3c83ff370": #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:570e1c7d-29de-4357-8d92-a79bcbf922e0"
  )
)
